statements: SELECT * FROM project_progress;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project_progress WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, progress_status FROM project_progress WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT project_id, project_name, design_iteration FROM project_progress WHERE design_iteration > 3;
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE progress_status IN ('In Progress', 'Completed');
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, design_iteration FROM project_progress WHERE group_id = 2 ORDER BY design_iteration ASC, project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, progress_status FROM project_progress WHERE student_id = 5 AND design_iteration = 3;
SELECT project_name, group_id FROM project_progress WHERE progress_status IN ('Completed', 'On Hold') ORDER BY group_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT project_name FROM project_progress WHERE design_iteration > 4 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM group_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM group_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM group_projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM group_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, iteration_number, iteration_date FROM group_projects JOIN design_iterations ON group_projects.project_id = design_iterations.project_id;
SELECT * FROM group_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date FROM group_projects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM group_projects WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_name, iteration_number, iteration_date FROM group_projects JOIN design_iterations ON group_projects.project_id = design_iterations.project_id;
SELECT project_name, iteration_number, iteration_date FROM group_projects INNER JOIN design_iterations ON group_projects.project_id = design_iterations.project_id WHERE iteration_number > 5;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT iteration_number, design_notes FROM design_iterations WHERE iteration_number = 2;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM design_iterations ORDER BY iteration_number DESC;
SELECT student_name, progress_description, progress_date FROM student_progress WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, team_lead_id FROM Teams WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT member_name, role FROM TeamMembers WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, team_id FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT Teams.team_name, TeamMembers.member_name, TeamMembers.role FROM Teams INNER JOIN TeamMembers ON Teams.team_id = TeamMembers.team_id;

SELECT project_name, iteration_number, iteration_description FROM Projects INNER JOIN DesignIterations ON Projects.project_id = DesignIterations.project_id WHERE DesignIterations.iteration_number = 1;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM Projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, email_address FROM Students WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT project_id, COUNT(student_id) AS num_students FROM Projects_Students GROUP BY project_id HAVING num_students > 3;
SELECT iteration_id, project_id, iteration_date FROM Design_Iterations WHERE iteration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, student_name FROM Projects JOIN Projects_Students ON Projects.project_id = Projects_Students.project_id JOIN Students ON Projects_Students.student_id = Students.student_id;
SELECT project_name, iteration_date, description FROM Projects JOIN Design_Iterations ON Projects.project_id = Design_Iterations.project_id;
SELECT student_name, major, status FROM Students JOIN Progress_Tracking ON Students.student_id = Progress_Tracking.student_id WHERE Progress_Tracking.status = 'In Progress';
